Prepare inpatient capacity for approximately 3 beds for dengue patients (including step-down wards if required). Coordinate with the blood bank to ensure around 1 blood/platelet units are available for dengue-related needs. Enhance triage and early warning at OPD and emergency units, with clear referral/transfer pathways for severe cases.
